extension.name: MyMuse Shipping USPS
extension.author: Gord Fisch
extension.description:
USPS Shipping for MyMuse

The USPS Shipping plugin supports USPS Domestic API v4 and USPS International API v2 using cURL for MyMuse 4 running on Joomla 3.

Configuration Requirements

  • Configure Plugin Settings
    • Enable the USPS Shipping Plugin from Joomla!'s plugin extension list.
    • Add the USPS Username provided to you by USPS.
    • Request USPS to move your API username to production. This MUST be completed by USPS.
    • If your web server requires the use of a proxy server enter it into the settings.
  • Configure MyMuse for USPS Shipping
    • Add each USPS Shipping Service your store will use (both domestic and international).
    • Ensure the shop's Bill To Zip/Postal Code is entered under Shop Settings.
    • Add proper weight to each of your products that will require shipping costs.

Copyright 2018 Arboreta Internet Services.

Based on USPS Shipping for Virtuemart
Copyright 2013-2018 Park Beach Systems, Inc.
